title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 167.2 - Records for territorial subdivisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 167.2 - Records for territorial subdivisions

State Regulations

To the extent that a utility's customer rates are based
on a cost area or accounting division, the records that support those rates
shall be maintained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
167.2

Amended

New

York State Register December 9, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 49, eff. 11/24/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
